title: Arsenal: Ian Wright had a breakdown on Twitter as Gunners collapsed vs Bayern Munich | Metro News
text:
Sean Kearns for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 9:41 pm Ian Wright labelled Arsenal a â€˜f g shamblesâ€™ (Picture: Getty) 
Arsenal legend Ian Wright couldnâ€™t bare watching his old side collapse against Bayern Munich and turned off the TV as the Germans went 4-1 up. 
Arsene Wengerâ€™s side were level at the break after Alexis Sanchezâ€™s equaliser ruled out Arjen Robbenâ€™s opening goal. 
However, the Gunners were 4-1 down on aggregate just 20 minutes into the second half after Thiago Alcantaraâ€™s brace and Robert Lewandowskiâ€™s header.
